results.deck: Pac-Man enters the lucrative world of falling block puzzles.
results.name: Pac-Attack

results.deck: A 2002 Gamecube exclusive (later released for PS2 and XBOX) FPS. It takes place five years after the Die Hard trilogy.
results.name: Die Hard: Vendetta

results.deck: An enhanced edition of Gauntlet Legends, Dark Legacy added more playable characters and levels.
results.name: Gauntlet: Dark Legacy

results.deck: Three brave starfighter pilots. Three unique starfighters. One mission: Save Naboo.  This was the first LucasArts release on the Playstation 2 system.
results.name: Star Wars: Starfighter

results.deck: The last of Sega's NFL 2K series to be released on the Dreamcast, later being ported to other platforms. It was one of the highest rated football games ever released.
results.name: NFL 2K2

results.deck: The Sims: Bustin' Out
results.name: The Sims: Bustin' Out

results.deck: NHL 2003 didn't introduce many new features, unlike its successor NHL 2004. However, it did introduce the new GameBreaker mode which allowed a player to build up momentum by winning fights, scoring goals or by landing a big hit.
results.name: NHL 2003

results.deck: Play and explore different worlds in six different modes, in this iteration of the classic puzzle game, Tetris.
results.name: Tetris Worlds

results.deck: Going where no previous James Bond game has been, GoldenEye: Rogue Agent is the first Bond game that breaks all the rules by letting players experience life as a high-rolling, cold-hearted villain and live on the dark side of the Bond universe.
results.name: GoldenEye: Rogue Agent

results.deck: An action game with alternating driving and shooting levels.
results.name: Maximum Chase

results.deck: Mashed is a top-down racing game that features a host of tracks, weapons and cars to play in an up to four-player multi-player scrap.  Available on PS2, XBOX and PC.
results.name: Mashed: Drive to Survive

results.deck: Spy vs Spy is a remake of the game that was based on the popular Mad Magazine feature from the 1960s
results.name: Spy vs Spy

results.deck: Classic first-person arena shooting crosses paths with fast-paced third-person melee combat in this unique Xbox-exclusive spin-off of Unreal Tournament 2004.
results.name: Unreal Championship 2: The Liandri Conflict

results.deck: Dragon Ball Z: Sagas is an action Beat em' up based on the popular anime
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Sagas

results.deck: 25 to Life is a third person shooter video game that allows players to play cops and robbers.
results.name: 25 to Life

results.deck:
Mashed: Fully Loaded is the expanded release of the original Mashed: Drive to Survive. Race against CPU opponents or friends. Use all manner of weapons to blow stuff up and avoid being blown up yourself. 
Mortars, Missile launchers, Flamethrowers, Drum bombs and more are the key to winning.
results.name: Mashed: Fully Loaded

results.deck: Driv3r is a 2004 action game released by Atari and Reflections. You play as Tanner as he tries to sneak himself into a gang of car thieves and take them down from the inside.
results.name: Driv3r

results.deck: Colin McRae Rally 04 is the fourth installment in the series and the first game in the series not to feature the WRC licensed teams and liveries.
results.name: Colin McRae Rally 04

results.deck: Jedi Outcast is a first and third person shooter in which players control Kyle Katarn, a mercenary and former Jedi Knight who, after the first few events of the game, needs to relearn how to use the force.
results.name: Star Wars: Jedi Knight II - Jedi Outcast

results.deck: Doom 3, a more story-focused remake of the original Doom, is a sci-fi first-person-shooter that was widely considered the most graphically advanced game available for its time.
results.name: Doom 3

results.deck: The first motocross game on the PS2, which included modes such as career, freestyle and stunt.  Mini-games where also included.
results.name: MX 2002 featuring Ricky Carmichael

results.deck: A Tie-in game to the popular Wallace & Gromit feature Film, The Curse of the Were Rabbit is a Platforming game for the PS2 and Xbox with open world elements starring the popular British claymation Characters Wallace and Gromit.
results.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were Rabbit

results.deck: Open Season is a 3rd person plat-former based on the movie by the same name. Developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.
results.name: Open Season

results.deck: The sequel to Fight Night 2004. The game would focus on knockouts by adding Haymakers to the total punch control setup. The GameCube version had the Super NES game Super Punch-Out!! playable. In addition, you could unlock Little Mac as a playable character in the main game.
results.name: Fight Night Round 2

results.deck: A hunting game publised by Activision.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2005 Adventures

results.deck: Crash Twinsanity is a Title in the Crash Bandicoot series in which you play as Crash and his Arch-Enemy Neo Cortex. The game features free-roaming levels and is less about collecting crystals, as in the previous games, and more about completing levels.
results.name: Crash Twinsanity

results.deck: In the 2004 edition of Sega's 2K series, the ESPN license is added, changing the presentation across the game.  Jeremy Roenick of the Philadelphia Flyers serves as cover athlete for the second year in a row.
results.name: ESPN NHL Hockey

results.deck: MTV Celebrity Deathmatch is a video game based off of the popular clay-mation television show. Playable characters include a myriad of celebrities such as Carrot Top, Mr. T, and Jerry Springer.
results.name: MTV Celebrity Deathmatch

results.deck: Tron 2.0 is a story-driven first-person shooter that takes place in a computer world.  It stands as a video game sequel to the 1982 movie 'Tron'. Bruce Boxleitner reprises his role as Alan Bradley, with the game's main character being his son, Jet Bradley.
results.name: Tron 2.0

results.deck: Released originally in 2001, Spy Hunter is a remake of the 1983 classic arcade game.
results.name: Spy Hunter

results.deck: The future is what we make it, so let's set the future right.
results.name: The Terminator: Dawn of Fate

results.deck: An entry in EA's soccer franchise released to coincide with the 2002 World Cup. It is very similar to the previously-released FIFA 2002, with a few additions and tweaks.
results.name: 2002 FIFA World Cup

results.deck: Go from a local unknown to a superstar skater in the fifth installment of the Tony Hawk franchise, adding a new story mode, new tricks (including wallplanting and the ability to travel on foot), and enhanced character creation (including face mapping and trick creation).
results.name: Tony  Hawk's Underground

results.deck: It's not mission difficult, it's Mission: Impossible.
results.name: Mission: Impossible - Operation Surma

results.deck: Electronic Arts videogame based on the Arena Football League.
results.name: Arena Football

results.deck: It's a football game, yo.
results.name: ESPN NFL Primetime 2002

results.deck: A game that tries to capture the thrill and excitement of drag racing.
results.name: IHRA Drag Racing 2004

results.deck: NBA LIve 2005 is the 2005 version of the NBA Live Franchise.
results.name: NBA Live 2005

results.deck: A spin-off version of Guilty Gear X2, in which up to four players can fight AT THE SAME TIME. It's as chaotic as it sounds.
results.name: Guilty Gear Isuka

results.deck: Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights is the first Scooby-Doo video game on sixth generation consoles.
results.name: Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights

results.deck: Phantom Dust is a unique action strategy game heavily inspired by collectible trading card games.
results.name: Phantom Dust

results.deck: Shellshock: Nam '67 is a third-person shooter set during the Vietnam War from the developers of Killzone.
results.name: Shellshock: Nam '67

results.deck: Transworld Snowboarding is an Xbox exclusive snow boarding game. It boasts over 20 huge levels.
results.name: TransWorld Snowboarding

results.deck: Take freestyle football to another level in this trick-filled Fifa Street
results.name: FIFA Street

results.deck: Just like you always wanted, Jaws Unleashed grants you the opportunity to play as a shark in an open-world game.
results.name: Jaws: Unleashed

results.deck: Second Sight is a game about an amnesiac psychic looking to uncover the secrets of his past and piece together the events that lead to his incarceration in a mental institution.
results.name: Second Sight

results.deck: The third installment of Xbox exclusive DDR titles.
results.name: Dance Dance Revolution ULTRAMIX 3

results.deck: Playboy: The Mansion is a Sims-style game that puts players in control of Hef's lifestyle and management of his magazine empire.
results.name: Playboy: The Mansion

results.deck: Immerse yourself in some of the greatest Star Wars Battles ever!
results.name: Star Wars: Battlefront

results.deck: The sequel to Amped, Amped 2 is a snowboarding game similar to the Tony Hawk games.
results.name: Amped 2

results.deck: A sequel to Far Cry: Instincts with a different campaign.
results.name: Far Cry: Instincts - Evolution

results.deck: NHL 2K3 is the third game in 2K's long running NHL series, and featured Philadelphia Flyer Jeremy Roenick on the cover.
results.name: NHL 2K3

results.deck: Ford Racing 3 is a racing video game published for the Game Boy Advance, Playstation 2, Xbox, Nintendo DS, Arcade and PC.
results.name: Ford Racing 3

results.deck: Ubisoft Shanghai brings the first sequel to the highly acclaimed videogame Splinter Cell, adding a brand new multiplayer component and new maneuvers such as the SWAT turn.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow

results.deck: Multi-platform Lotus licensed racing game from Kuju interactive, most notable for it's attempt at an innovative control system.
results.name: Lotus Challenge

results.deck: The final Army Men title from series creators 3DO, this third person shooter ends the Army Men storyline.
results.name: Army Men: Sarge's War

results.deck: Buffy stabs, jabs, and slings sarcastic quips in this third-person action adventure title based upon the popular television series.
results.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer

results.deck:
Heart-pounding, cinematic-quality, real-time graphics.
Feel the rush as you decimate swarming enemy masses!
results.name: Crimson Sea

results.deck: Sonic Riders stars Sonic and his friends, and their quest to win in the World Grand Prix. Their new rivals are the Babylon Rogues, a mysterious group that has information about the Chaos Emeralds.
results.name: Sonic Riders

results.deck: The story of a young, curious, and green-loving photojournalist named Jade, out to unravel an alien conspiracy on her home planet of Hillys.
results.name: Beyond Good & Evil

results.deck: Mutant Melee is a 4-player fighting game set in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles universe.
results.name: TMNT: Mutant Melee

results.deck: Mafia is a sandbox style, third-person action game set in the fictional city of Lost Heaven. The player assumes the role of Tommy Angelo as he rises through the ranks of the Mafia in Depression-era America. The game was developed by Czech developer Illusion Softworks.
results.name: Mafia

results.deck: Rally racing sim developed by Warthog Plc together with popular rally driver Richard Burns, it was praised for its realistic physics and is often regarded as one of the most demanding racing games on the market.
results.name: Richard Burns Rally

results.deck: The war between Heaven and Hell has begun.  It's up to Spawn to save the world from certain destruction.
results.name: Spawn: Armageddon

results.deck: A football game from EA sports. With commentary from John Madden & Al Michaels and  St. Louis Rams running back Marshall Faulk on the cover.
results.name: Madden NFL 2003

results.deck: A video game based on the TV show of the same name. As CIA agent Sydney Bristow players use a variety of weapons, gadgets and disguises to fight their way through this stealth-based third-person shooter.
results.name: Alias

results.deck: You are freedom's answer to fear. You stalk terror wherever it hides. These deeds you do so others may live. Hunt down terrorist cells worldwide from London to the Cayman Islands.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield

results.deck: Exclusive to the Xbox and had a story written by veteran DC Comics writers.
results.name: Superman: The Man of Steel

results.deck: A soccer game for a wide range of platforms, endorsed by the world-famous English footballsman David Beckham.
results.name: David Beckham Soccer

results.deck: The King of Fighters: Neowave is a 2D 3-on-3 fighting game in the King of Fighters series, featuring three gameplay styles and new hardware.
results.name: The King of Fighters: Neowave

results.deck: The Warriors is an action adventure 3D brawler that covers and expands the events depicted in the movie of the same name.
results.name: The Warriors

results.deck: Bring your bling and live the life of 50 Cent and the G-Unit as they clean up the streets of New York in this ill-regarded third-person shooter.
results.name: 50 Cent: Bulletproof

results.deck: A racing game with cars from the Ford company.
results.name: Ford Bold Moves Street Racing

results.deck: NCAA Football 2004 is an collegiate American football game released in 2003. It was developed by EA Tiburon and published by Electronic Arts. The cover athlete is Heisman Trophy winner and former USC quarterback Carson Palmer.
results.name: NCAA Football 2004

results.deck: Justice League Heroes is an Action-RPG that allows you to play as members of the Justice League of America as they work together to take down the various villains in the game.
results.name: Justice League Heroes

results.deck: Remake of the original Sid Meier's pirates, placing you in the role of a pirate searching for his kidnapped family. Battle rival pirates on the high seas and command an ever-growing crew of pirates as you work towards becoming a legendary pirate.
results.name: Sid Meier's Pirates!

results.deck: A formula 1 racing game.
results.name: F1 2001

results.deck: Alter Echo is a third-person action game that allows you to change your EchoPlast suit so that it is in Sword-form, Gun-form or Stealth-form.
results.name: Alter Echo

results.deck: An updated version of Outrun 2, Coast 2 Coast adds 15 new tracks, several new cars, and the ability to slipstream to this easygoing arcade racer.
results.name: OutRun 2006: Coast 2 Coast

results.deck: Got a bad case of road rage?  Let out your aggression in this smash-em-up racer.
results.name: Test Drive: Eve of Destruction

results.deck: A half-human, half-vampire secret agent in a tight leather outfit uses guns and razor-sharp tonfa blades to wreak bloody havoc against Nazis seeking supernatural artifacts. Best premise ever? Perhaps.
results.name: BloodRayne
